sixteenWeeks.title: 16 Weeks
sixteenWeeks.description: Content Director. A group of students sharing our experiences in tech across different roles, locations, and companies!
sixteenWeeks.longDescription: Content Director. Leading a team of 16+ content creators to produce engaging video content. A group of students sharing our experiences in tech across different roles, locations, and companies!

frv.title: Front Row Ventures
frv.description: Investment Team. FRV is Canada's first university-focused venture capital fund investing in Canada's most promising university founders.
frv.longDescription: Investment Team. Responsible for sourcing deals and conducting due diligence. FRV is Canada's first university-focused venture capital fund investing in Canada's most promising university founders.

soGal.title: SoGal Waterloo
soGal.description: Marketing Lead. Working to close the diversity gap in entrepreneurship and venture capital.
soGal.longDescription: Marketing Lead. SoGal is working to close the diversity gap in entrepreneurship and venture capital.

bitFinca.title: Bitfinca
bitFinca.description: Full-stack development and front end. A blockchain-based lending platform that allows anyone to microinvest in ventures that matter. MarketMake Hackathon submission.
bitFinca.longDescription: MarketMake Hackathon submission. Full-stack development and front end. Bitfinca is a blockchain-based lending platform that allows anyone to microinvest in ventures that matter.

techplus.title: Tech+
techplus.description: Mentorship Program Organizer. Facilitated over 100 mentorship pairs. Cultivating a more inclusive and diverse tech community at UWaterloo.
techplus.longDescription: Mentorship Program Organizer. Facilitated over 100 mentorship pairs. Tech+ aims to cultivate a more inclusive and diverse tech community at UWaterloo.

pearShare.title: Pearshare
pearShare.description: Angelhack Singapore 2018. Code for a Cause Impact Winner. Reducing food wastage through an after-hours marketplace.
pearShare.longDescription: Angelhack Singapore 2018. Code for a Cause Impact Winner. Reducing food wastage through an after-hours marketplace.

spaceLab.title: SpaceLab
spaceLab.description: First team in Southeast Asia to win SGD$60k grant to launch biology experiment sent to the International Space Station. Launched on the SpaceX Falcon 9 on June 4, 2017.
spaceLab.longDescription: First team in Southeast Asia to win SGD$60k grant to launch biology experiment sent to the International Space Station. Launched on the SpaceX Falcon 9 on June 4, 2017.

ted.title: TEDx
ted.description: TEDxYouth@SAS Executive Producer. Lead Organizer. Selected to attend TEDFest 2018, an official TED conference in NYC
ted.longDescription: TEDxYouth@SAS Executive Producer. Lead Organizer. Selected to attend TEDFest 2018, an official TED conference in NYC

frc.title: Robotics
frc.description: Team Captain. Youth Mentor. Project Manager. Awarded Excellence in Robotics Award, Senior Technology Award and PTA Scholar Award for contributions to robotics
frc.longDescription: Team Captain. Youth Mentor. Project Manager. Awarded Excellence in Robotics Award, Senior Technology Award and PTA Scholar Award for contributions to robotics

gnome.title: G-nome
gnome.longDescription: BostonHacks 2019 submission. G-nome provides a personalized experience tailored for the patient including medication reminders, symptom tracking and appointment making through a voice-activated care system.

htn.title: Ã«quiliberate
htn.longDescription: Hack The North 2018 submission. Equiliberate combats ergonomic challenges that computer users face today by empowering you to fix your posture.

aboutMeArt: What started as weekly baby ballet classes turned into my passion. I began dabbling in various performing arts from the age of 5. I have training in the RAD, CSTD and Vaganova style of ballet, as well as contemporary, jazz, hip hop and tap dance. I am passionate about creating work and have choreographed various pieces. Aside from dance, I enjoy acting and singing. I have performed in musical theatre productions, short films and choir concerts. I am experienced in teaching ballet, jazz and musical theatre to children and adults. I hope that through teaching I will be able pay it forward and inspire younger dancers to pursue their passions throughout school and beyond.
